title: This Sneaker Trend Instantly Elevates Your Casually Cool Outfits
description: It’s already been declared the color of the year.
excerpt: Well, I did not see this one coming. Brown sneakers are already owning 2025. Find the most stylish options to shop now.

html:
Vince Mojave Suede Retro Sneakers

The easiest way to test out the trend this winter is with a sleek pair of suede sneakers. They’ll add a chic touch of texture to any outfit.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Elmwood, Sand Trail Beige Suede

Material: Suede

Adidas Country Japan Suede Sneakers

Those iconic three stripes have received a sweet makeover this winter with deep chocolate brown accents highlighted on top of a softer sand hue.

Sizes: 4.5-10.5

Colors: Brown Desert/Dark Brown

Materials: Suede

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Row Owen Sneaker

If you’re looking for a minimalist option to add to your wardrobe, this pair whispers chic with tonal mesh and leather fabrics crafted in a simply elegant silhouette.

Sizes: 35-42

Colors: Brown, White

Materials: Poly mesh, nappa leather

Toms TRVL LITE Retro Runner Sneaker

Emily Ratajkowski reminded us just how fun a wild print can be when she wore these cheetah-print Toms sneakers. The best part is what you can’t see: the lightweight cloud-like insoles that make the kicks extra comfortable.

Size: 5-12

Colors: Mini Cheetah, Black Metallic Suede, Drizzle Grey Suede, Natural Egret Suede, Clay Suede

Materials: Suede, textile

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Dries Van Noten Leather-Trimmed Suede Sneakers

Ask any fashion editor what their favorite brown sneaker is right now, and I bet you they’ll unanimously call on Dries Van Noten’s retro-inspired kicks.

Sizes: 35-41

Colors: Tan, Black

Materials: Suede, leather

Puma Easy Rider Vintage Suede Sneakers

Puma’s Easy Rider is the retro-inspired sneaker that adds a cool attitude to any casual outfit. Pair them with jeans, leggings, or even a knit dress this winter.

Sizes: 6-10

Colors: Haute Coffee/Puma White, Alpine Snow/Puma White, Puma Black/Puma White, Deeva Peach/Alpine Snow, Puma Red/Puma White

Materials: Suede, nylon, rubber

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

New Balance 9060 Sneakers

For an effortlessly cool way to add Pantone’s 2025 Color of the Year into your wardrobe, test drive these mocha mousse-colored New Balance sneakers.

Sizes: 6-13

Colors: Camel

Materials: Suede, rubber, mesh

Nike Isamaya Ffrench Edition Air Max Dn Sneakers

Lean into the deep, rich side of chocolate with this dark pair of Nike x Isamaya Ffrench sneakers. The futuristic design stands out in a crowd of boring silhouettes.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: Brown

Materials: Textile, rubber

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Loewe Ballet Runner 2.0 Sneakers

True fashionistas will appreciate the unexpected but undeniably chic pop of blue on this brown pair of Loewe sneakers.

Sizes: 35-42

Colors: Brown/Yellow/Blue

Materials: Fabric, leather

Jeffrey Campbell Toned Sneaker

Layered panels of suede collide in this pair of brown sneakers to create a fun design that feels of the moment.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Natural, Blue, Ivory

Materials: Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Alohas Tb.490 Rife Sneaker

Again, a splash of leopard will make a surprisingly interesting addition to any sneaker collection, especially this calf hair design from Alohas.

Sizes: 5-11.5

Colors: Tan, Silver, Cream, Red

Materials: Genuine calf hair, leather

Autry Reelwind Low Sneakers

A soft berry hue complements the chocolate trim on Autry’s sporty kicks. Lace them up when you’re running errands for a chic way to get things done.

Sizes: 36-41

Colors: Ebony, White

Materials: Technical weave, terry cloth, suede

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Miu Miu Plume Suede Sneakers

On the lighter shade of the brown spectrum, these sandy-hued sneakers will be the pièce de résistance in your sneaker collection.

Sizes: 34-42

Colors: Desert Beige, Orchard Pink, White, Navy

Materials: Suede, leather

Maison Margiela Replica Sneakers

Maison Margiela’s celebrated Replica sneakers get a modern update with this multi-textured design in deep, rich brown.

Sizes: 35 - 41

Colors: Brown

Materials: Calfskin, rubber

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Reformation x Veja Venturi Sneakers

Reformation and Veja joined forces to give the Venturi sneaker a new colorway that’s right on trend with an ash brown hue mixed with soft pops of lilac.

Sizes: 36-42

Colors: Walnut, Juta

Materials: Recycled polyester

Salomon Gender Inclusive XT-Pathway Gore-Tex® Sneaker

You won’t find functional sneakers that are waterproof and as cool as Salomon’s gender-neutral creation. Wear them on hikes or hot girl walks for a comfortable, chic way to anchor your looks.

Sizes: 9 - 13

Colors: Black Coffee

Materials: Synthetic upper, textile lining, rubber sole

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
